body:
Comment 1: 
as mentioned in rev 1fcb3b9a, exp/gui and exp/gui/x11 are moved to
https://code.google.com/p/x-go-binding/

especially, gui/gui.go is https://code.google.com/p/x-go-binding/source/browse/ui/ui.go
now.
Go-SDL author should update its package to either use x-go-binding or include a copy of
ui.go.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
